articles.title: Doctors discover the source of mysterious intoxication
articles.description: Some people get drunk without drinking because their gut bacteria produce alcohol from food. Researchers have now identified the microbes and biological pathways behind this rare condition, auto-brewery syndrome. articles.title: Millions with dementia still prescribed drugs linked to falls and confusion
articles.description: Despite longstanding guidelines, many dementia patients are still prescribed brain-altering medications that can raise the risk of falls and confusion. articles.title: A devastating cotton virus lurked undetected in U.S. fields for nearly 20 years
articles.description: A damaging cotton virus thought to be a recent invader has actually been hiding in U.S. fields for nearly two decades. articles.title: Scientists find a natural sunscreen hidden in hot springs bacteria
articles.description: Researchers studying cyanobacteria from hot springs in Thailand have discovered a new natural UV-blocking compound with impressive antioxidant power.
